pl.korotkevics.ships.shared.infra.logging.core

Class SharedLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.korotkevics.ships.shared.infra.logging.core.SharedLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Target

    public class SharedLogger
extends Object
implements Target
    Logger shared across modules. A Log4J2 wrapper. Log4J2 can be configured with log4j2.xml. A short manual is present within the XML file.
    Since:
    2017-12-10
    Author:
    Sandor Korotkevics
    See Also:
    Target
